entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h over exposed coastal sections this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
